TEXT_GAIUSA308_00740_SEQ_02<tab>Laurentius leaves you abruptly without providing any answers. Follow him and accost him again.
TEXT_GAIUSA308_00740_SEQ_03<tab>Now clearly agitated, Laurentius takes his leave of you once more. Chase him down and find out what he is hiding.
TEXT_GAIUSA308_00740_SEQ_04<tab>You have defeated the Garlean soldier summoned by Laurentius. Confront him and ascertain the nature of his relationship with the Empire.
TEXT_GAIUSA308_00740_SEQ_05<tab>Laurentius has taken to his heels once more. Give chase before he makes good his escape.
TEXT_GAIUSA308_00740_SEQ_06<tab>Laurentius has eluded you yet again. It is time to bring this chase to an end. Apprehend him.

TEXT_GAIUSA308_00740_SEQ_07<tab>You vanquish a squad of imperial troops, prompting Laurentius to admit defeat at long last. Shamed by your devotion to the cause, he repents his decision to sell information and supplies to the Garleans, and resolves to give himself up to the Order of the Twin Adder. Return to the Druthers and tell Buscarron all that has transpired.

TEXT_GAIUSA308_00740_SEQ_08<tab>After listening to the tale of Laurentius's betrayal and subsequent repentance, Buscarron expresses hope that the Order of the Twin Adder will take pity on the disgraced Wood Wailer. He then shares some exciting news: the missing sylph elder has been found.

TEXT_GAIUSA308_00740_BUSCARRON_000_000<tab>I'm glad you've come, friend. There's something I want to talk to you about. You know I said I thought we might have a traitor in our midst─someone as was aiding the Garleans? Well, I'm thinking I may have identified our suspect.

TEXT_GAIUSA308_00740_BUSCARRON_000_001<tab>There's a regular of mine who used to dine on thin soup, and sip his pint on account of not being able to afford another. But of late, he's taken to ordering my best wines and the finest cuts of meat I can lay my hands on.
TEXT_GAIUSA308_00740_BUSCARRON_000_002<tab>Were he a merchant, I'd prob'ly think nothing of it, but this lad's a Wood Wailer.

TEXT_GAIUSA308_00740_BUSCARRON_000_003<tab>...And Wood Wailers don't earn that kind of coin. By chance, I was musing on where the money was coming from when you first told me about the Garleans in the forest, and I couldn't help putting two and two together.
TEXT_GAIUSA308_00740_BUSCARRON_000_004<tab>Suffice it to say, if a Wailer's working for the Empire, none of us is safe.

TEXT_GAIUSA308_00740_BUSCARRON_000_005<tab>The lad I'm talking about goes by the name of Laurentius. Last I heard, he was in the South Shroud. Find him, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, and if he <var 1A 02 /var>is<var 1A 01 /var> up to no good, put an end to it─and him, if it comes to that.
TEXT_GAIUSA308_00740_LAURENTIUS_000_010<tab>Can you not see I am on patrol? Be gone. If you have business with the Wailers, take it to the Barracks.
TEXT_GAIUSA308_00740_LAURENTIUS_000_020<tab>You again? I told you I am busy with my duties. Now piss off!
TEXT_GAIUSA308_00740_LAURENTIUS_000_030<tab>Not long now... Hmph. To think patrol routes and rations would fetch such a price...

TEXT_GAIUSA308_00740_LAURENTIUS_000_031<tab>No more than I deserve, though. 'Tis little wonder the Empire has risen to such heights. If only the <var 1A 02 /var>Wailers<var 1A 01 /var> paid men their worth...
TEXT_GAIUSA308_00740_LAURENTIUS_000_032<tab>Y-You! What did you─? How long have you─? Help. Help! Heeelp!
TEXT_GAIUSA308_00740_LAURENTIUS_000_033<tab>Please! Come quick, my friends! It is I, Laurentius! I am under attack!
TEXT_GAIUSA308_00740_LAURENTIUS_100_033<tab>You should have buggered off when you had the chance. Now <var 1A 02 /var>die<var 1A 01 /var>, you interfering little swine!

TEXT_GAIUSA308_00740_LAURENTIUS_000_034<tab>How...? How did you...? You just... I-I know nothing! I was on patrol. He just appeared! I...I thought <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var> were working for the Garleans!
TEXT_GAIUSA308_00740_LAURENTIUS_000_040<tab>Wh-Why are you following me!? Leave me be! I told you─that Garlean just appeared. I know nothing!
TEXT_GAIUSA308_00740_LAURENTIUS_000_050<tab>How long do you mean to keep this up? What is it you imagine I've done? Enough! Enough, I say!
TEXT_GAIUSA308_00740_LAURENTIUS_000_051<tab>It's... It's over, then. Aye, I sold maps and rations to the Empire. It was I. I meant no harm. I only wanted the coin.

TEXT_GAIUSA308_00740_LAURENTIUS_000_052<tab>The Wailers are good. Strong. I was proud to join their ranks. <var 1A 02 /var>Am<var 1A 01 /var> proud. But... They do not provide. They preach justice, honor, duty. But in the end, it is those with money who do as they will. Who live as they will.

TEXT_GAIUSA308_00740_LAURENTIUS_000_053<tab>...So I sought an opportunity to change my fortunes, and took it. All I've done, I've done for money. Endangered myself, my home, everything and everyone I love... Why, my actions have put your life in danger, too...

TEXT_GAIUSA308_00740_LAURENTIUS_000_054<tab>...Though you do not yet realize how much. Heh heh heh! Bloody idiot─did you imagine that you had cornered me? It is not <var 1A 02 /var>I<var 1A 01 /var> who is cornered.
TEXT_GAIUSA308_00740_LAURENTIUS_000_055<tab>Garleans! I've brought the <var 28 ((Race)) E94801 /var> <var 08 E905 ((bitch)) ((bastard)) /var>!
TEXT_GAIUSA308_00740_LAURENTIUS_000_056<tab>Permit me a question, if you will. Are <var 1A 02 /var>all<var 1A 01 /var> adventurers so deluded as to believe they can challenge the power of Garlemald?

TEXT_GAIUSA308_00740_LAURENTIUS_000_057<tab>You would need a veritable mountain of gil to fund such an endeavor! Such is the cost of fighting great power. Or of making it. Or of <var 1A 02 /var>remaking<var 1A 01 /var> it, as we will Gridania.
TEXT_GAIUSA308_00740_NPC_000_058<tab>So that's the way of it. Swapped your hard bunk at the Barracks for a feather bed in Garlemald, did ye? <spit>
TEXT_GAIUSA308_00740_NPC_000_059<tab>You there, <var 28 ((Race)) E94801 /var>. You stand here at ol' Busc's wish, no? Then you don't stand alone.
TEXT_GAIUSA308_00740_LAURENTIUS_000_060<tab>QIB

TEXT_GAIUSA308_00740_LAURENTIUS_000_070<tab>Impossible... How did you best the Empire's finest? And with bandits and poachers at your side!? They are your sworn enemies! Why do they fight with you and not <var 1A 02 /var>against<var 1A 01 /var> you!?

TEXT_GAIUSA308_00740_LAURENTIUS_000_071<tab>...Ah, but I know the answer only too well. Buscarron. This is <var 1A 02 /var>his<var 1A 01 /var> doing. His words are wont to inspire men to act. Better men than I... Gods, what have I become? What have I <var 1A 02 /var>done<var 1A 01 /var>?
TEXT_GAIUSA308_00740_LAURENTIUS_000_072<tab>I... I am sorry. No more will I pursue this folly. No more lies. No more bribes. I will go to the Order of the Twin Adder and confess my crimes.

TEXT_GAIUSA308_00740_LAURENTIUS_000_073<tab>There is something I would like you to tell Buscarron. Tell him Laurentius the fool says “thank you.” I feel as though a veil has been lifted from before my eyes.
TEXT_GAIUSA308_00740_BUSCARRON_000_080<tab>Aye, Laurentius confessed to his crimes. I just had word from the Twin Adder. Seems he marched straight into the Nest and gave himself up.

TEXT_GAIUSA308_00740_BUSCARRON_000_081<tab>The lad's had quite a life, you know... His mother was killed by a brigand when he was only small. As a young man, he joined the Wailers, hoping to spare his fellow Gridanians the misery he'd known growing up.
TEXT_GAIUSA308_00740_BUSCARRON_000_082<tab>Trouble is, protecting Gridania's too big a job for one man, and he came to believe that he couldn't make a difference─that it was hopeless.

TEXT_GAIUSA308_00740_BUSCARRON_000_083<tab>There are few things more dangerous than desperation, and a man lost in the dark is easily drawn to the glimmer of coin. I reckon he thought that if he couldn't change the lot of his fellow man, he might as well change his own. Thing is, he <var 1A 02 /var>was<var 1A 01 /var> making a difference─just not on his own. Somehow, he'd failed to grasp one simple truth─that those things we cannot do alone, we must do together.

TEXT_GAIUSA308_00740_BUSCARRON_000_084<tab>...Eh? He asked you to thank me, did he? Then there's good in him yet. I just hope them at the Adders' Nest are able to see it... What he's done ain't easy to forgive, but I'd like to think he'd be afforded a chance to make amends.
TEXT_GAIUSA308_00740_BUSCARRON_000_085<tab>But let us leave fates to the Twelve. I have other news for you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. The sylph elder has been found!
TEXT_GAIUSA308_00740_POP_MESSAGE_000<tab>A foreboding wind blows through the treetops...
TEXT_GAIUSA308_00740_QIB_TODO001<tab>Defeat Laurentius and his party!
TEXT_GAIUSA308_00740_LAURENTIUS_BATTLETALK_01<tab>You mean to stand against the might of the Empire with this Redbelly rabble at your side? Hah!
TEXT_GAIUSA308_00740_REDBERRYLEADER_BATTLETALK_02<tab>Your eyes betray your words, coward. You know full well the Wailers fear the Wasps' sting.
TEXT_GAIUSA308_00740_IMPERIALLEADER_GAIUSA308_BATTLETALK_03<tab>After these trees drink your blood, I will see to it they are cut down and burned.
TEXT_GAIUSA308_00740_LAURENTIUS_BATTLETALK_04<tab>Show them what happens to those who oppose the Empire!
TEXT_GAIUSA308_00740_COEURLCLAW_GAIUSA308_BATTLETALK_05<tab>If this is a fight Buscarron wants won, then the Coeurlclaws will fight it.
TEXT_GAIUSA308_00740_LAURENTIUS_BATTLETALK_06<tab>How? Why!? You scum have no allegiances!
TEXT_GAIUSA308_00740_IMPERIALLEADER_GAIUSA308_BATTLETALK_DEAD<tab>So, this is to be my end...
TEXT_GAIUSA308_00740_LAURENTIUS_BATTLETALK_DEAD<tab>How...? How has it come to this?
